titleStmt.title: Masora. A collection out of the learned master Joannes Buxtorfius's Commentarius Masorethicus. / By Clement Barksdale.
titleStmt.author: Buxtorf, Johann, 1564-1629.
Barksdale, Clement, 1609-1687.
